alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 10:44PM AKDT until October 26 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: Southerly winds have brought in warmer temperatures near sea level for Haines and Skagway as of 10pm Tuesday night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Haines Highway and Klukwan. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain has begun near sea level, but some mixing remains possible overnight with lower accumulations expected. Temperatures remain cold enough along the Highway for snow where greatest accumulations area expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
